entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
